com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan

Interface Phase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Element, Interruptible, ParentElement<Step>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultPhase

    public interface Phase
extends ParentElement<Step>
    Defines the interface for one Phase within a Plan. A Phase is an ordered list of one or more Steps, which each describe a single unit of work.

    For example, a Step might represent a cluster task that needs to be updated, while the Phase is a list of all of those cluster tasks.

    See Plan docs for more background.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.plan.ParentElement

        LOGGER
